text: WAQF Tower is a skyscraper in Niamey, Niger, and is the country's tallest building, standing at 59.85 meters. Construction finished in 2019.https://www.emporis.com/buildings/1444213/waqf-tower-niamey-niger Emporis The foundation was ceremonially laid by Niger's president Mahamadou Issoufou.https://www.idbgbf.org/portal/detailed.aspx?id=540 IDBG == References == Category:Skyscrapers in Niger
title: WAQF Tower
